content: ## clematis-mini is a beginner friendly intermediate pattern using decrease post stitches and popcorns to create the texture using a 3ply thread weight yarn with a 2 00 mm mm hook a mini doily measuring 7 5 can be made **this pattern is a free download **russian translation by ula tomaszewska japanese translation by masako kawahara thanks to my team of testers jovetted souza pinto sheila hickman gray juanita carol heather bolander alexander gemma owens celia menezes ushasaravanan vishiv pasala gaurangi shah
